div.div: Annual observational data (selected period) for the Arctic observatories.
div.p: EC concentrations and SDs are volume-weighted, whereas the fraction that is biomass burning ( f bb) and Î´ 13C values (and their SDs) are mass-weighted. For the Arctic mean, a value is given without Barrow due to the shorter (less than one full year) period of the data coverage (table S5).
